name: Chapter 2 - New Life
description:
Head over to www.spritesequence.com to play the original project!

The second chapter

Episode length : around 30 - 40 minutes

The second Chapter of the Sprite Sequence saga. Haven't played Chapter 1 yet? It's FREE on Steam or itch.io!

Thrown into a new, unknown world, our protagonist will have to learn to fend for himself and survive in the wild before he can be freed from his ordeal. 

Key features : 

  • Story oriented
  • Exploration with light puzzle and combat sections
  • One part features a small farm simulation!
  • Hand-drawn and animated
  • Around 30 to 40 minutes long

 Chapter 2 is a higher-definition compilation of the short game sequences #11 to #26 published weekly in 2016. The improvisation based process at the heart of the project gave rise to a surprising story that is getting more complex and detailed in this chapter.
